ygData.subject: FAO Travis
ygData.msgSnippet: Travis, I will agree that you have strengths and weaknesses like any other.  Indeed, your speed is something to be in awe of; although somehow I doubt you
ygData.messageBody:
Travis,

I will agree that you have strengths and weaknesses like any other. Indeed,
your speed is something to be in awe of; although somehow I doubt you could
out run everything, or even everybody. Be careful of unfounded confidence
my barbarian friend.

Let us agree to disagree as to which race is the superior. It will be a
waste of energy (ooc: and upset a few people on this list no doubt), and
neither of us will convince the other, of that I am certain.

Itan the Whistler
